amendment.description: Amendment requires the NSF to establish a STEM grant program for Hispanic-serving institutions as authorized in the America COMPETES Act of 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 5 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to require the National Science Foundation to establish a STEM grant program for Hispanic-serving institutions as authorized in the America COMPETES Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Crowley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
